ner_simple.description: A simpler tagging scheme version of the regular matscholar2020v1 NER model.

relevance.description: Classifier for predicting relevance to materials science text

aunp11.description: Named entity recognition for gold nanoparticle with 11 labels using BERT pre-trained on materials science text.

aunp2.description: Named entity recognition for gold nanoparticle adjective descriptions (DES) and noun morphologies (MOR) using BERT pre-trained on materials science text.

doping.description: Named entity recognition for solid-state doping [DOPANT (dopant species), BASEMAT (host material), DOPMODQ (dopant quantity or carrier density)] using BERT pre-trained on materials science text.

solid_state.description: Named entity recognition for solid state materials data using BERT pre-trained on materials science text.
